post.body: New blog looks nice, but the old one looks better.
was snowing vigorously a few hours ago here in Rochester
Major just embarrassed me on his blog: http://tiny.cc/OFytm
What about Blackberry friendly? :P Just picked up a Pearl a couple weeks ago.
Hey major, are you going to be putting the keynote audio up on your blog?
Maj, you're asking the internet to read, thats a lot to ask for them! :P
Good to hear, I've been dying to get on and play some Halo 3! This did give me some time to do some GTA 4 and Dead Rising stuff
You should probably do a full blog post, make it easier. Can it even fit tin the twitter character limit?
Lulz at the twitter phisher. Jacked some big names accounts. :P
Catching up on TGS stuff and adding content to the site!
Cool new program for my Mac called Twitterific - I like it, nice and handy when I'm not using my Blackberry
The MS Tokyo Game Show conference starts at 11PM EST. http://ping.fm/nVGGA Hopefully some big stuff will come out of it. NXE Release Date?
Just got done playing Halo 3, I now have 13 XP in Team Slayer on the new ranking system! ^_^
